title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: self-hostable LLM runner with a simple CLI and REST API for running Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, etc.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama; chat, embed, pull, and manage models in a few lines.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node & browsers; same API surface as the Python SDK.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain adapter to use Ollama models for chat, tools, and embeddings inside LangChain pipelines.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI (chat, multi-user, RAG, Docker) that talks to a local Ollama instance.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; sync/async, streaming, embeddings, unit-tested.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community Ruby gem for chatting and pulling models from Ollama.

title: ollama-cli (rich TUI)
summary: Terminal-UI wrapper around Ollama with chat history, markdown, and model switching.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS-Code extension that turns any Ollama model into a local GitHub Copilot.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for running Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official container images (CPU & GPU) published to Docker Hub.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models as generators or embedders in RAG pipelines.

title: ollama-camunda
summary: Camunda 8 connector that calls Ollama for human-task summarisation or decision suggestions.

title: ollama-n8n-node
summary: n8n community node to prompt local Ollama models inside no-code workflows.

title: ollama-rag-chatbot
summary: Streamlit demo that combines Ollama + Chroma for private PDF Q&A.

title: ollama-logseq
summary: Logseq plugin that summarises blocks or brainstorms with a local Ollama model.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing strongly-typed async bindings to the Ollama API.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Community C# SDK with .NET 8, streaming chat, and embeddings support.

title: ollama-rails
summary: Ruby on Rails wrapper that exposes Ollama as an internal REST service with ActiveRecord caching.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord bot that streams Ollama answers into any guild channel with slash commands.
